Uses of Class
com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.Label

  • Packages that use Label 
    Package Description
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2  

    • Uses of Label in com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2

      Subclasses of Label in com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnimatedLabel
      This is a special label that contains not just a single text to display but a number of frames that are cycled through.
      Methods in com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2 that return Label 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Label Label.addStyle(SGR sgr)
      Adds an additional SGR style to use when drawing the label, in case it wasn't enabled by the theme
      Label Label.removeStyle(SGR sgr)
      Removes an additional SGR style used when drawing the label, previously added by addStyle(..).
      Label Label.setBackgroundColor(TextColor backgroundColor)
      Overrides the current theme's background color and use the one specified.
      Label Label.setForegroundColor(TextColor foregroundColor)
      Overrides the current theme's foreground color and use the one specified.
      Label Label.setLabelWidth(Integer labelWidth)
      Use this method to limit how wide the label can grow.
      Methods in com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2 that return types with arguments of type Label 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected ComponentRenderer<Label> Label.createDefaultRenderer()
